metadata.title: CVE-2017-18212 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in JerryScript 1.0. There is a heap-based buffer over-read in the lit_read_code_unit_from_hex function in lit/lit-char-helpers.c via a RegExp("[\x0"); payload.

criterions.comment: iotjs package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0+715-1ubuntu1').
